locations.name: Kinabatangan River
locations.description: Likely staying in a lodge along the river, famous for its exceptional wildlife viewing opportunities via river cruises and jungle walks, including proboscis monkeys, orangutans, pygmy elephants, and diverse birdlife.

locations.name: Mabul Island
locations.description: An island off the coast of Sabah in the Celebes Sea, serving as a popular base for accessing world-renowned diving and snorkeling sites like Sipadan, known for its rich marine biodiversity, turtles, and coral reefs. (Note: This is a highly likely representative island based on the description; other nearby islands like Kapalai or Mataking are also possibilities).
